summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2007, for the improvement of 31st Avenue South, from McClellan Street to Norman Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with concrete, brick or granite corners, and by grading the same and by constructing wooden bulkheads, except certain streets thereof, which shall be paved with stone blocks or other suitable material, under Ordinance No. 20412 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
